alert.note: Alert for Canadian; Oklahoma (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 3:44PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Oklahoma and east central Canadian Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 343 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over southwestern Oklahoma City, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Oklahoma City, southwestern Edmond, Midwest City, Del City, Yukon, Bethany, Warr Acres, The Village, Nichols Hills, Valley Brook, Tinker Air Force Base, Forest Park, Woodlawn Park, Lake Aluma, Smith Village, The Capitol, Wiley Post Airport, The Fairgrounds and Will Rogers Airport. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 122 and 137. Interstate 40 between mile markers 141 and 157. Interstate 44 between mile markers 114 and 130. Interstate 240 between mile markers 1 and 6. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
